inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: plain X-rays and 99mTc MDP bone scintigraphy

inclusion.criterion: bone pain linked to Paget's disease itself
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Bisphosphonate therapy within the year prior to the study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Paget's Disease of Bone, confirmed by diagnosis and evaluation. Starting Bisphosphonate as first-line therapy.
